General.Name: Park Hotels & Resorts Inc
General.Description: Park is one of the largest publicly-traded lodging real estate investment trusts (REIT) with a diverse portfolio of iconic and market-leading hotels and resorts with significant underlying real estate value. Park's portfolio currently consists of 40 premium-branded hotels and resorts with approximately 25,000 rooms primarily located in prime city center and resort locations.
General.Address: 1775 Tysons Boulevard, Tysons, VA, United States, 22102-4285
